name: Battle Sister

skills.name: Sever
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases Turn Meter by 10% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Condemn
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. This attack is always critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
